content: maisie scarf to match the lacey beanie available separately this scarf is suitable for small dolls and not for babies however the matching hat is available for preemie babies we do not recommend scarves are used on young babies especially premature ones easy to follow full colour instructions for a hat to last the years also available as part of a set with the lacey beanie prem - 5 years www etsy com/uk/listing/871209762/lacy-beanie-scarf-pdf-crochet-pattern-0
